Headline: MSIS @ UMD | AWS Certified Solutions Architect | Ex-Freshworks
Summary: 👋🏽 Hi, my name is Raghul  🎓 Soon to be grad with a Master's of Science in Information Systems (Dec 2022).  👨🏻‍💼 On top of my education, I worked for 2+ years as a Data Analyst at Freshworks. I was in charge of building ad hoc reports, dashboards - tracking key SaaS metrics(SLA, CSAT, Churn rate, etc.) within GTM teams.   In addition, I was deeply involved in analyzing support tickets, identifying areas of improvement, driving forecast(churn prediction), and playing a collaborative role in providing the necessary visibility for Technical Support, CSMs’ and Product teams to drive their business goals.  💻 As for my future, I’d love opportunities where I’m able to leverage big data and my B2B data analyst experience to help tech companies to discover insights, identify patterns, and build data models that have real business impact.  💪🏽Technical skills/Tools:   Python (NumPy, Pandas, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Plotly, Scikit-Learn), R Programming   Jupyter Notebooks   DBMS (MySQL, AWS Redshift)   Tableau, PowerBI, Advanced Excel, Microsoft PowerPoint   🏔 Outside of work, I also love:          Cooking🍜, Travelling🏝 , Playing soccer⚽️  Email: raghul@umd.edu Phone: +1 (240)726-9941
